other_title: 地下幻燈劇画 少女椿 (Japanese)
plot: After losing her parents, young flower selling Midori is put up by a fairground group. She is abused and forced to slavery, until the arrival of an enigmatic magician of short stature, who gives her hope for a better future.
ending_theme: "Mayoigo no Ribbon" (迷い子のリボン) by Minako Naka
insert_song: "Akai Shitagi" (紅い下着) by Kinji Nomura
